Economics, Analytics, and Decision Sciences (EADS)
item.description:
From: 28-02-2025 15:00
To: 12-06-2025 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Guidelines for filling out the application


Call for applications: Ita | Eng


Phd Program: Economics, Analytics and Decision Sciences


Duration: Up to 4 years


Official language of the PhD Programs: English.


Scholarships and grants:


  • 7 scholarships funded by the IMT School

Selection Process:  Academic qualifications and interview.


Detailed information is available in the call for applications.

item.title: CULTURAL SYSTEM (CS)

From: 28-02-2025 15:00
To: 28-05-2025 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Guidelines for filling out the application


Call for applications: Ita | Eng


1 specialized track:


  • Cultural Systems - Management of Cultural Heritage and Museum Studies

Duration: 3 years


Official language of the PhD Program: English.


Scholarships and grants: 9 scholarships funded by the IMT School


Selection Process:  Academic qualifications and interview.


Detailed information is available in the call for applications.

item.title: imtlucca-mbht-2025
item.description:
From: 25-03-2025 15:00
To: 30-06-2025 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Guidelines for filling out the application


Call for applications: Ita | Eng


2 specialized tracks:


  • Neuroscience, Experimental Psychology, and Psychophysiology (NEPP)

  • Human Thought: Philosophy, History, and Science (HT)

Duration: 3 years


Official language of the PhD Programs: English.


Scholarships and grants: 7 scholarships funded by the IMT School, distributed among the tracks as follows:


  • 5 for the track in "Neuroscience, Experimental Psychology, and Psychophysiology" (NEPP)

  • 2 for the track in “Human Thought: Philosophy, History, and Science” (HT)

Selection Process:  Academic qualifications and interview.


Detailed information is available in the call for applications.

item.title: Systems Science (SyS)
item.description:
From: 11-03-2025 15:00
To: 30-05-2025 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Guidelines for filling out the application


Call for applications: Ita | Eng


4 specialized tracks:


  • Computational Mechanics

  • Complex Systems and Networks

  • Learning and Control

  • Software Quality

Duration: 3 years


Official language of the PhD Programs: English.


Scholarships and grants:


  • 11 scholarships funded by the IMT School

  • 1 ERC-funded project-based scholarship co-funded by Università Campus Bio-Medico di Roma and IMT School

Selection Process:  Academic qualifications and interview.


Detailed information is available in the call for applications.
